title: Get lost and find tranquility in this serene Japanese bamboo grove
text:
Get lost and find tranquility in this serene Japanese bamboo grove 
Published By: Mashable - Yesterday 
The Sagano Bamboo Forest, located in Arashiyama district west of Kyoto, is a must-see for any traveler to Japan searching for a certain othe...
